content: This looks like a NZ based company. Does anyone here know much about this?
Any more details @Grahame Grieve ? I can't find them on a Google search - just a bunch of links on Maori Sovereignty.

Thanks - no onward links and I'm not sure that their Trademark will sit well with Te Mana Raraunga - the MƒÅori Data Sovereignty Network. The subject of patient access is highly topical here with yesterday's release of the recommendations of The NZ Health & Disability Sector Review. In particular...
"consumers should be able to control and access their own health data and information" although nothing to say about how this might be implemented. Also heaps of content specifically related to Maori in the Report.
great - what is is that they do?
Not surprised to hear that, @Tim Blake !
